title: VA - Therina Cinema 1929-2008 (Greek Music) @flac
description:
This box is called 'Therina Cinema (Summer Cinema) 1929-2008' and consists of six CDs.
It was given by the newspaper'Vima Tis Kiriakis' in July 2008.

It contains songs from Greek movies
